title: Text To Speech (TTS)
description: This is a text to speech emulator built with React and the VoiceRSS API and can also be installed as a PWA.
author: Jack Jona

github.readmeContent: This is a text to speech emulator built with React and the VoiceRSS API. It takes text that you type and converts it into a voice of your choosing that can also be installed as a PWA (Progressive Web Application).
